entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls and a thunderstorm. Local blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
